reviews.review_text: Have a great experience at this location . The manager Yak was very nice and knowledgeable. His team was very helpful. I have been looking for a patio set for a while but couldnt find anything I like. Once I saw this set , I fell in love and wanted it in my home right away . My car was too small to fit the big box , Yak was able to arrange fast shipping, and I was able to get it the next day . I was not sure about this set, and Yak gave me his honest opinion. The set is high quality  and very comfortable.  I love it.  Thank you, Yak and his team.  Highly recommend homedepot, especially this location.
If youre looking to spruce up your home decor, this is a great place to check out.

Customer service manager Jazz and staff Simran at Store #7043 helped me a lot today. Simran was really patient and kind, She listened me very carefully and provided me solutions to my problem. Her working attitude was serious, and she made me feeling warm and CARED! Jazz is a wonderful customer service manager. He was patient too and reliable! I was a little disappointed with the product i purchased But my experience today made me trust the Home Depot! I will choose the Home Depot again!
Very good hardware store with reasonable prices and offers. If you want anything related and from dewalt, the Home Depot is the best place you can get it from.
In the summer, this is one of my favourite places to take my mom and get her something. Staff here speak a multitude of languages and are super kind.

My father has been so stressed trying to find the right window locking handle; driving back and forth from Vancouver to Richmond Home Depot. Thank you so much to Glenn from the bottom of our heart; Glenn was kind, patient, and helpful everytime my father came into the store to ask questions. It was challenging for my father to converse and speak proper English as English isnt his first language . Glenn didnt just give simple replies; he listened patiently, researched several times and wasnt willing to give up. Finally, he was able to find the exact one for us and gave my father all the information he needed. Thank you for your outstanding customer service Glenn, my father has never met someone as dedicated to customers as you are. You really made his day! I hope your hard work doesnt go unnoticed by the management and the company. Home Depot is lucky to have an employee like you. Thank you thank you thank you we really appreciate you.

I was there to find items for a kitchen renovation. Really clear signs on the appliances. Good variety of kitchen cabinet choices.  Good displays to help you get a feel for the finished installed  cabinets.  Some stores have a staff kitchen consultant to help design your kitchen.  Everything youd need all in one store.

The Home Depot at this location has such wonderful crews specially gardening section. Darren and Quno helped load my truck with lots of heavy bricks. I would give them more than 5 stars they are great!

Vincent at the Home Depot plumbing department was incredibly helpful! He patiently and professionally assisted my father-in-law in finding everything he needed. Vincent s service was exceptional, and I highly recommend this location. Thank you, Vincent!

Im in the process of moving and Home Depot is my choice to find moving requirements  , from different size cardboard boxes  , black hard plastic bins and bubble wrap they have it all at reasonable prices

VINCENT, the expert electrician helped us find the plug outlet that we needed. Even though we had quite a bit of problems to ask, he was very patient and helped us with all issues. Vincent was very professional and polite! Thank you
a employee called JAZZ helped me. He was really nice, incredible customer service, instead of dumping us to the side like some other employees, he solves our issue
Priscilla is very kind, friendly, and professional! She was very patient and helpful in assisting me. If I could, I would give her 6/5 stars. :-)

I am very pleased to how my enquiry into buying Bark Much was handled. I was served by Nikhil who was very helpful making sure I get the same product purchased over a week ago. Nikhil arranged the product to be delivered to my trailer and then loaded by Cyrus,Yuvraj and Bernard. The four of them worked as a team and are of great value to Home Depot. Thank you to all.
One stop shop place to buy lumber appliances, flooring, everything under one roof I like the Home Depot

Maryam (Miriam) from the Customer Service department was very kind and professional! She helped me get my AC delivered the same day. I had it in my home in under 2 hours. Thank you so much, Maryam (Miriam).

I regularly used this Home Depot doing a home improvement project and Matthew from the paint section went above and beyond in helping me understand my needs and the correct paint and quantity my project required

Went in looking for some plexi glass for filling in a air conditioning unit for my window and the staff helped me find a alternative for 10 bucks apposed to a 100 dollar sheet of plexi glass. Good thing they dont run on commissions and are there to help.
I was getting the pets friendly ice melt for my two dogs. Manjit who help me and service good customer service to me.

great experience buying a new samsung fridge. from the moment we set foot at the store we were taken care by a lovely lady who explained to us patiently to the installation and adjustment of the fridge. amazing experience altogether!

Alfred from Hardware is an amazing associate and truly cares about his job a lot. Even though he was busy when he helped me he did not rush with helping and rather explained what to do and helped me throughout the process of cutting my keys this afternoon. Deserves a raise!

I found the right plants I need indoor. I also bought the jr. hand truck for heavy load shopping from the cab to my unit in the building where I live. Very helpful to an old lady as my hands are incapable for any load.

I try to buy electric outlet today, walk back and forth can not decide which kind of items I should chose.  Susan with home depot uniform come to me, and nicely tell me what kind of electric parts I should chose, bring to me super nice idea. I appreciate got Susan help and bought what I need also save a lot money, because Susan help me chose package items which is better deal. Such lucky day for me to meet such experienced home depot staff. Thank you, Susan!
Catherine from outdoor department is awesome. She gave us great help with inventory and price. Thank you, Catherine, and everyone in this location.

Was very disappointed with customer service & walking around trying to flag down any employee who was interested/available to help when AMir walked by, was immediately available to help, totally polite & a joy to deal with.  Thanks again AMir!
Outstanding service from William who went above and beyond to find a closet rod holder. This was on Sunday August 6 @ 12:30 PM. Thanks for all your help.

I just had one of my best experience at Home Depot today. The staff named Vincent who helped me at the plumbing aisle was very knowledgeable and helpful. He pointed out I needed a different hose cap and answered all of my questions. Vincent was super capable and friendly. I m super impressed!

I am beyond thankful to Suzzane, one of the staff at this Home Depot branch.  She is a caucasian lady who walks with a cane. She invested her time and shared her great knowledge to explain to me what tools I needed and how I could better plan. She walked with me to other isles because she was concerned if I can purchase some specific tools. She is patient, knowledgeable, approachable, and caring. She was amazing when it came to communication, collaboration, reliability, work quality, problem-solving, and timeliness. She went above and beyond the call of duty. Thanks to Home Depot for hiring respectful, knowledgeable and professional staff like Suzzane. Hats off to Suzzane.
Returned my online-bought air conditioner here with quick service and no hassle. Will come here instead of Canadian Tire next time I need hardware.

Quick paint service, even on a busy Saturday. Even tho when I went the guy was alone, he was quick but not rushed.  And the colour match service, so so good.  Had damage from a 3M strip in my rental apartment and its PERFECT.
Great products and best price. The staff is always helpful and friendly. Highly recommended.

April 25/23 Went back for another client return. Quick, efficient, friendly. KHIZER exceeded my expectations! Then I noticed he had an in training badge on. I LOVE great service! Feb 22/23 I had to make a return for a client who made an out of province purchase for her dad in Vancouver. I wasnt sure how well this would go. The client called customer service to explain the situation. The returns staff Fred and Mostafa were absolutely amazing, professional, and efficient. Lester helped me move the items from my car to the store. I was in and out of there in less than 15 minutes! I have always been a fan of Home Depot and their great service, but this really took things to another level. Makes me wonder why I/we would ever go anywhere else! Thanks guys you are the best!!
This is my favorite store. Everything for everyday construction work. Good advice from staff. Some workers there with big experience. Thanks!
This five 5 star is for Vi. She works at the front. Vi is super friendly and hard working. Your awesome Vi.

Home Depots prices and selection blow the only other big box guy away... when I go to the other place I leave empty handed and its a joke. Every time, since the beginning of time ... Then I drive over to Richmond and find an employee who helps me. Wow, what a concept. She or he walks me over to my thing that I need.  Amazing. Then I looked around and found the other hard to find thing for my project that I was making up as I go.  A 48 floating shelf and bracketing  for $33?  Who sells that for that price? The second thing was $4.33. Then the guy at the checkout was trying so hard to help me it was almost too much.... too much help and happiness.

This store provides the best service among all the Home Depots in Metro Vancouver. Some of their staff are very knowledgeable and helpful (like Samor in Plumbing) and dont hesitate to ask them questions when you need some help. Be patient when its busy. The return process is usually super easy and trouble free. I only had one bad experience 4-5 years ago. Things are much better now. Maybe they had a new management team?
Staff are really kind and helpful, in store stock is usually accurate.

One of the slats on my son s bed was broken a few days ago, so we decided to go to this Homedepot to find a replacement for that piece of slat. Luckily, Chase at the lumber department was there to help us! Not only did he help us to find the right piece for it, he was very patient and kind when I asked him for tips on drilling (this is our first time trying to fix furnitures like this)after he finished cutting it for us. Thank you, Chase, for helping making his bed like new again! :)

I like how Home Depot has almost everything you need for home repairs.  Replacing burnt light bulbs with new LED bulbs.  Smoke and carbon monoxide alarms with 10 year worry free battery backup, no more beeping for dead batteries.  Free Kid s Workshop for children to build a project each month.
For pick ups go to Bibian, great customer service :)

Over the years Ive come to appreciate the evolving business model of the Home Depot all the more. Apart from the Warehouse size supplies for every DIY project under the sun, their online shopping usually offers either free delivery or free pick-up from the Store and offers an even wider range of products. The really neat thing is that unlike online only retail outlets, I can take any problematic item directly back to our closest Home Depot and theyll take it from there - no need to organize with Courier Services for any return items. I find this hybrid model of physical store + online shopping mix suits me very well, and Im happy to see more outlets doing the same - best of both worlds.

My experience  with the associate  name Ringo was great.  He has very good  knowledge  of his products.   He went out of his way to help out.  Great  job. Because  of Ringos  customer  service  I will always  come here n shop.  He works  for Richmond  home depot.
It s Home Depot... nothing much to say. Some cheap finds this season: fiddle leaf fig tree ($22), cedar planter boxes ($45-60 depending on size), Sea Soil ($7.99).
Great tools equal a great job ... Thank you to all the workers and Home Depot

As someone who suffers from irregular sleep schedules, I really appreciate the early opening and late closing hours. The Home Depot website is already pretty intuitive as a guide to help find specific items across the large warehouse. To compliment that, the staff there have offered me tons of guidance on where to find things (in the rare occasions where item locations are not registered on the website) or suggestions on which items fit the specific needs I have for them.

Our experience was very nice and pleasant. All the employees were very kind and helpful but the most outstanding one today was Anurag who helped us find the correct materials to help our decking project that also fit with our needs. I would recommend this place to anyone that needs help with a project that requires manual labour.
Great service and nice staffs. Huge selection of everything you need the most for home repair, materials, and so on. Lots of free parking available on site.

I went looking for painting today and this gentleman Deshannon (I believe his last name was ,sorry if I got it a little wrong ) in the painting Section , was just amazing ! Super helpful , polite and very efficient .My first attempt to try and paint a wall and he made it seem so easy with all his tips and tricks ! I learnt so much today. Thank you so much ! Karla x

Velly and Vincent,  thank you so so much to explain and solve the questions about the range hoods for my parents. They r super satisfied with your service. Especially you Velly!!! Never had such this awesome experience before.
Everything was fine, thanks guys especially Fred, he helped us to find kind of filters that we wanted

Had the most amazing experience and service this morning in the Paint department. Thank you Edmund for all your knowledge and help today with picking the right paint for the job. This employee definitely went above and beyond and we will be coming only to this paint department to see him! Thank you Edmund :)

Great service! Daniel and Margaret at the pro desk are so helpful, friendly and with a great sense of humour. Another guy was also explaining to us differences with types of rock. We felt like VIP served by three staff answering questions and putting down orders. Other staff in the gardening area also knowledgeable. Seeing people enjoying their job makes me so happy!
Home Depot offerred us the best deal for those top model LG Washer and Dryer ! Thank you Home Depot for such good customer service!

Arun who works here at home depot deserves this review.  I am not an easy person to please.  But this knowledgeable and kind gentleman Arun went above and beyond with helping me find the right tools and parts I was looking for. Give this gentleman a raise!
I went in looking for a product I didn t know the name of and wasn t sure how to describe. Devang went above and beyond helping me find several options and pick the best one for my needs.

We went to pick up some o-rings and left after purchasing three large appliances. What an experience! On June 30 we visited your store in Richmond. We decided to look at appliances, since we need to replace a few. Long story short: an extremely knowledgeable and very pleasant staff member named Brian showed and explained to us in understandable English the properties of the different machines. I have been treated like a little dumb old lady whose biggest concern is the color scheme elsewhere. A big thank you to Brian for sharing all the info with us. For example: I seem to be shrinking and have to put my upper half inside the my current washer to take out the laundry, feet off the ground. I cant wait for my front loader! We feel confident that we got a fantastic deal. Please let Brian know how much we enjoyed the experience. Go Brian!! 5 out of 5 or 10 out of 10.

The personal working in the paint section helped me find a color match for a discontinued collection. Shopping here was not stressful and many people around me were being helped with with some pretty important questions. Staff are confident, knowledgeable and helpful.
Store is well stocked and laid out.

Went in to Rmd HD exhausted and lacking time, and bumped in to Myron in Appliances who helped with knowledge and measurements and all around details to replace my broken set...got all that I needed worry free....check out service and overall service, was extraordinary - thank you for your help - Myron, Barb, Susie, and Thomas who helped me to my car! This experience made my day - feeling grateful.
Store has all of the necessary homeware products
more accessible than downtown one, making it better.
Hassan and Vincent in plumbing helped me find what I needed to connect the copper cooling coil to the water line under my sink for brewing beer.

This review is specifically about Paul who helped me at the blinds department. Paul is super knowledgeable and helpful. We looked into custom blinds and rollershades. He was extremely patient and informative. Ended up helping me cut the blinds they had. He ended up assisting over 6 groups afterwards. Management: Paul deserves some recognition!!! He has rekindled my faith in the customer service of home depot!!
A lot of house hold items of different specifications are available here. The staffs are extremely friendly and helpful offering their suggestions and recommendations
Organized for the most part. Friendly staff. Only downside is that some products that are available online arent available at location.

We have been working in the Richmond area for a couple months on a renovation and I have been to this location  several times. The staff has always been helpful and friendly. The store is always clean, organized and well stocked. We recently had an issue with some machinery we had just purchased, which was stressful because we re working on a tight timeline.. anyways, customer service was handled perfectly! The manager directed us to Ali who was friendly, understanding and knowledgeable. Our problem turned into a quick fix and we were happy and back on the job. It s so refreshing to find quality service! Good job :)

My mom and I were shopping for blinds 10 mins before closing, and Evan was AMAZING! We were not expecting to be given any assistance so close to the closing time but Evan was very accommodating and informed the front desk staff that we would probably need some extra time. He was very friendly and willing to help us even though the store was basically closed. Despite the fact that we were not able to buy blinds that day (because the cutting machine was not working and they were closing), we came out with a thorough idea of what we plan to get in the future all thanks to Evan!!!

We want to thank the Home Depot, Richmond BC,  and especially Larry from plumbing and Susana and other staff for taking such good care and providing with the best customer service to us. We had a bathroom renovation and Larry was the most knowledgeable, kind and helpful to work with. We had ran into a problem when an item we bought was discovered to be faulty after the installation which makes things a bit complicated. Again Larry was extremely helpful and with Susana provided us with a solution that we greatly appreciated. Renovation can be a very stressful time for home owners and when you ran into problems it is even more difficult. Thats when the Home Depot stuff was a god sent to us with their caring approach and excellent service! Highly recommended!

This Home Depot is a standard in my books period mainly because it is so large and located perfectly across from IKEA and all sorts of other renovation type stores along Bridgeport way. This Home Depot is really massive and has a huge plant and outdoors section as well as a huge warehouse that is oftentimes well stocked. There is no shortage of customer service agents as well to provide good advice. They have a pickup facility for online orders as well. There is a large contractor area and lumber and building supplies section. Overall, if you are looking for a tool or part or decor for your house, this is the place to find it.  There is a McDonalds across the parking lot if you are feeling like needing a break and a Lordo and Staples across from that to get the rest of your supplies for the home. Have come often and will continue to return!

Best Home Depot I have ever been to. The staff here are quality. I never even have to ask for help before somebody offers their assistance. Mind you, I probably always look confused which might explain why. Still, the staff always go above and beyond to help. Also, the store is always clean and organized, which makes finding what you need (or discovering what you didnt know you needed) all the more easier.

Home Depot Richmond Pro Desk team We are doing a big reno project at our home and had to purchase many different types of materials. We didnt know where to start and were overwhelmed. Then the assistant store manager, Mario Dedios connected me and my wife with the Pro Desk at Home Depot Richmond. Myron and Susanna helped us tremendously and made the process very pleasant, with flawless efforts. They went out of their way and beyond to accommodate our work schedules and even did overtime to help. We never experienced this much quality services at any Home Depot location in our lifetime (We are in our late 40s). Myron brought in many associates from different departments to provide us as accurate information as possible and also in a timely efficient manner as possible. The Pro Desk supervisor, Mark Wong, also gave us critical advice with purchase timing and delivery efficiency. Special thanks to Myron who oversaw all the packing process for days until the shipments left the store and didnt even rest on his day off but called us from home to make sure all the shipments arrived safe and sound. I would recommend Pro Desk Team at Home Depot Richmond to anyone who is planning in bigger projects than just regular minor DIY jobs. They are better than excellent, like they never sleep until you receive your orders. Thank you Pro Desk team!

Like Ive said many times before Home Depot employees are very helpful. Quick to help and considering the amount of items they have, they seem to know where everything is. As a professional carpenter I find myself there first before any other place. Because for the most part they have what I need and the prices are fair.
Thanks for your help Maddi! Couldnt have loaded up the car without you. We did 1000lbs this morning!

Excellent service. I enjoy going to home Depot so much when I have the opportunity to. I think one thing that would really help me as a customer is understand when their seasonal stuff was coming out. I know Im just nic-picking but sometimes I show up expecting to be able to buy something and I cant yet.

As I come to expect from Home Depot, this branch has an expansive selection of products, including metal poles, power tools, dryers, washers, ranges and pretty much everything you need for your home. The staff are awesome. They know their stuff really well and are extremely helpful, so theyre always answering questions, but there are plenty of staff to ask. Also, they provide decently priced cutting services. You can also use their tools (not power) to hand cut for free. There is a massive parking lot shared between a few businesses outside.

This store has what you want when it comes to lumber or most anything that you need for building supplies,They have cabenets plumbing toilets sinks bath tubs laundry tubs faucets heating electrical lighting very good stock of hand tools as well as power tools compressors shop vacs wet dry fasteners many variety screws nails staples gutters roofing concrete flooring  paint some carpet, Appliances lawnmowers weed wackers trimmers ladders step ladders landscaping flowers plants plant food soil bug spray ant roach silverfish (rat traps assorted) fencing gates fencing panels we were looking for something to get rid of all the nasty weeds in my yard, talked to may and she was very  knowledgeable and helpful. thank you for having this great employee at your store, Thank you again *                         Chris  D

I love this store.. all my plants and equipment are from this place.. today I had to find one wood log which was tough to find but the staff there are helpful. Anurag from the wood cutting section helped us a lot today and made our day easy.. thank you so much
Im NOT a fan of the self checkout. I dont use them and dont support taking jobs away from people. Appreciate that HD always has actual tills open and lines are minimal.

The pro desk staff at this location are amazing! If you ever need to get something done, be sure to ask for Daniel Leong, hes super patient and professional. You can definitely count on him to get what you need. The store overall is also pretty tidy considering its the only one in Richmond so very busy all the time.

Thank James with minutekey at home depot for literally teaching us step by step how to break into our own car. I locked the keys inside my car and all the locksmiths gave me like at least an hour or so wait.. so I walked into home depot and explained the situation to James and he literally took the time walked me to the necessary aisles and explained how to access the unlock button inside the car! Thank you thank you thank you!
Great experience. Associates were very helpful and helped me sign up for the Pro Xtra rewards program, which I never even knew about!

We went to Richmond Home Depot to get paint for our bathroom tiles. Tiffany assisted us, recommended a particular type of paint, and we decided to get it. We provided a color code we saw on the paint manufacturer website, but it turned out to be the wrong shade after it was mixed (screen and real life doesnt match). Tiffany took the effort to try to fix that for us by manually calculating the difference in dye needed to match what we wanted instead of just telling us to buy another one. At that time we were satisfied with the new color so we bought it, but back under our home lighting we decided that the color still wasnt right so we went to a nearer Home Depot to get the correct shade (we had the actual swatches this time!). We told the paint associates there what we were trying to do and they told us it wouldnt work, and that Home Depot didnt carry that type of paint, which confused us. We called up Tiffany, and she did extra legwork to confirm for us that the paint type we originally got was correct and it would work. On top of that, she went above and beyond and called us back to tell us that a better quality primer was on sale, and put aside one can for us. She took time to explain things to us despite it being a very busy time at the store. She provided great customer service and made our visits to Richmond Home Depot very pleasant!

Today the service was amazing. The 2 employees that helped me today went above and beyond.  I needed some spray paint and the made sure they checked every shelf to make sure I got what I needed. Theres a guy in the plumbing section that wears a bandana and shorts, hes extremely knowledgeable also.

Cargo Van rental When your project calls for a larger vehicle, The Home Depot has a great selection of cargo van rentals in Richmond, to help you get the job done. Our cargo vans carry up to 3000lbs and seats two people. There are no mileage fees and we have great competitive rates. Come see us when you re in need of a rental van for your next project. Key Cutting Looking for key cutting services in Richmond? Whether it s car key cutting, house key cutting or any other type, we ve got reliable and fast key cutting services, so you re never locked out. Large Equipment Rental If you need special heavy equipment rentals for your next job in Richmond, The Home Depot Canada has a great selection of rentals, including construction equipment rentals, lawn equipment rentals and more   so you ll always have what you need. Outdoor Garden Center If you re looking for a helpful plant nursery or garden center in Richmond, you ll find everything you want at The Home Depot Canada. Our Garden Center has all the products and tools needed to help you grow and maintain a healthy, green garden. Propane Exchange Need a top-up on your propane for your next BBQ? We have an easy and convenient propane tank exchange service in Richmond to get you back to grilling for your family and friends in no time. Tool Rental Missing a tool for your project? Try our tool rental service, we ve got a tool for every job ready to go when you need it. From power tool rentals, to generators and more, you ll always have the tool you need when it counts and there is no need to commit to an expensive purchase for a one-time job. If you ve got a move in your future, we ve got everything you ll need to help make it go smoothly. Rent a moving truck, get moving boxes, bubble wrap and other packing and moving supplies in Richmond at the Home Depot. If you need special heavy equipment rentals for your next job in Richmond, The Home Depot Canada has a great selection of rentals, including construction equipment rentals, lawn equipment rentals and more   so you ll always have what you need.

We started the summer looking and researching BBQ grills.  We finally decided on a Weber Genesis II and found that Home Depot carried the most selections of different models.  The sales lady called Mae there was most knowledgeable and helpful from beginning  to the end.  We are impressed by her high standard of customers service and would recommend seeking her out for discussion of your grilling needs.

I went in with a specific problem. I was greeted at the door by an associate who directed me to the correct department. The associate at.the desk didnt know the answer and she was busy with another customer, which was fine. She directed me to the correct corridor and 5 minutes later showed up with a specialist who could answer my questions. An excellent store experience!

I needed in the tool cabinet to get a cordless angle grinder. I asked for help from Jeff & Joanna. They were a huge help, putting me on to a special offer which got me a $179 battery for an extra $25. Also stuck through the tap payment issue I figured I might have as I d misplaced my wallet and needed to tap using my phone. Way beyond the typical service you expect from other locations. Thank you again!

We received exceptional service with our recent patio set purchase.  The staff went beyond my expectations to assist from start to finish. This included loading the oversized items in to our vehicle. I would highly recommend this location.

We tried to phone the richmond store to order a new stove and couldnt get through on the phone so ordered it online.  Today we went into the store to take a look at it and found it for 310.00 dollars less than what we paid. Mary in appliances took wonderful care of the problem and rectified problem. Mary is great sales person and should be recognized as such by Home Depot.

Great service today. Gave me credit for a rental card that I didnt realize had expired. Thats awesome to me, a huge company thats willing to take care of their customers that werent smart enough to realize when a deal ended

I went to the Bridgeport Home Depot today and I was amazed at Samuel s customer service and helpful nature. If I could I would definitely give him a promotion and a raise for all of his dedication, and kindness as he had done for me today. I think the store is so lucky to have an employee like him. Thank you, and keep it up Samuel!

How can I not give this place 5 stars. It has what I need when I need it  the majority of the time. Often  I go in for something and come out with many other things. While knowing what you want is always best practice  the staff are amazing at helping you find what you want when needed.

Bought the last gazebo floor model on the floor and Andrea and Mohammed (Bridgeport Home Depot) were super helpful and a treat to work with. We had to disassemble it ourselves with no instructions as it was the last model, but they assisted in every way possible by offering us tools. The customer service shown was just great during the whole process. I ended up buying another Gazebo as a gift as the whole transaction was super pleasant.  Andrea had literally 8 different customers at the same time along with staff questions,  but still managed to find time to check in on us which was greatly appreciated. Super awesome work guys!

Ahmed and Jay in the lumber aisle were super helpful. They not only spent time in helping us decide which product to go with but also ensured that we were fully satisfied with our purchase. They are definitely an asset to the store.

Shopping at Home depot was a great experience today. James helped me with my kitchen and bathroom flooring renovation plans by going through all the details, explaining to me step by step in simple terms. I plan to come back again next month to  shop for our living and dining room laminate flooring.

I went to Richmond Home Depot to get a kitchen faucet and shower head. I was assisted by Chayse. Excellent customer service. Very friendly and knowledgeable. He is a staff in training. He deserves to become a fulltime staff member. Went the extra mile. I was at kitchen faucet section and when I asked where are the shower heads. He directed me to which aisle and he said he was going to meet me there. Excellent service!
The dude we dealt with at customer service went above n beyond to help us....need more people like him in this world!!!

Everything is always good at this store. The cashier I had that day was just the best. I had to get a piece of wood cut and it went quickly. This store should be commended on its hiring practice. Everybody gets a chance! Kudos to you Home Depot!
This big store provide a wide varieties of household products, parts and needs. Lots of brands to choose. Staff are nice and helpful. Parking is very convenient.
Great team there, always helpfull and knowledgeable.
